website_summaries.verdict: Detoxes by supporting the kidneys and liver – your body's primary filtering organs – with dandelion, juniper berry, ginger, and sarsaparilla.
pros: Assists your primary filtering organs – liver and kidneys
Purifying burdock and organic dandelion support the liver
Ginger, black pepper, and long pepper support blood flow, as Indian sarsaparilla adds spice

customer_reviews.title: Curbs my appetite :)
customer_reviews.text: Strong taste but it curbs my appetite! I drink about 4 bags a day. I let them steep in 1 liter of hot water & refrigerate it overnight. I drink it throughout the day but has specifically helped with my crazy cravings in the evening when I want to eat everything imaginable.
customer_reviews.author: Giggly Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tea
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea! I drink it every morning in replace of coffee. It does send you to the bathroom but it’s not a bad experience. I feel great after drinking it and when I don’t drink it I feel so bloated.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking it for a month now 3 times a day. I have IBS and it has helped me not feel so bloated
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Eviction notice to all doctors in the earth
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money to your bloodthirsty money greedy medical doctor and resolve your medical problems with detox tea...
customer_reviews.author: Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today. I steeped two bags for ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got the detox tea today. I steeped two bags for 30 minutes. I just served myself a cup in exchange for my usually glass of wine. Hoping to wake up feeling energetic and healthy minded tomorrow! I will keep this updated in a few days. I was nervous about the taste due to the reviews but after adding honey, I had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Liver damage
customer_reviews.text: This product can cause liver damage. I do not drink and my liver enzymes were elevated after drinking every night for 6 months 2 tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Americankiwi

customer_reviews.title: Out of stars
customer_reviews.text: I am out of words to Express my gratitude for this tea , it has help me feel good since I drank the first cup , I am also unable to give stars because five star is not enough for this tea I am very happy with this tea...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Ana Fleming

customer_reviews.title: My Cure-All.
customer_reviews.text: This tea is my cure-all. I drink it anytime I'm not feeling well. It has helped, headaches, neck pain, stomach aches... It is amazing. Plus it actually tastes good! I would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Effective for shedding water weight
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. Definitely dehydrating, would not recommend in combination with heavy exercising
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: THe best  Tea.
customer_reviews.text: THis is the best detox tea I've been drinking it now for about 6 months. Love the flavor and sometimes I put a green tea bag with it and it changes the flavor slightly and is a little like spice in the tea Wonderful taste and helps me sleep at night also great for the throat..
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad taste. I drink it one per day. The purpose I bought this because I am working hard to lose my weight meanwhile i hope this detox tea help me maintain a healthy body.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A Tea product of true value!
customer_reviews.text: I have many stomach disorders, issues... and have had to have 3 different surgeries concerning them. This Tea brings my stomach so much comfort and detoxing the bad stuff out that causes me pain. I drink it daily and have for over a year. It's been the only Tea to calm my stomach amd and ease my pain!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it detoxes anything (how does one measure such a thing?), but I know it tastes GREAT even without any sweetener. It has an earthy taste (but not TOO earthy) and a nice natural sweetness. I like to brew a bag of this and a bag of mint tea together, add 1 t. honey, and the juice from 1/2 lime. SO GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: Great tea
customer_reviews.text: One of the best teas, if you like cinnamon, wife likes peach, great price her on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4543

customer_reviews.title: Great spicy taste
customer_reviews.text: I used this tea as part of a 10 day green smoothie cleanse and felt like it worked as described. The spicy ( not hot) taste is a nice unique tea flavor and I liked it so much I drink it whenever I just want a tea.
customer_reviews.author: the checkwriter

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!! Liver damage!
customer_reviews.text: Did a quick google search only to find out this product can actually CAUSE liver damage- and has done so. I’m throwing my entire box away. You’ve been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This tea really works well. It also is very nice tasting. I really enjoy the flavor of this tea. It has a spicy yet sweet aftertaste. It has helped me with some kidney issues.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Detox tea that really works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with hopes of lowering my AST and ALT lab values (which indicate liver function). My lab values went back into normal range after 1 month of daily use of this tea (and honestly I didn’t drink it every day). I feel like it really worked for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather-loves-shopping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Detox Tea
customer_reviews.text: It helped me get rid of swelling and also cut weight. I've been drinking this tea for years and only saw my health improve.
customer_reviews.author: Roque

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting tea with a nice effect. Not too strong ad great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Side effect heartburn?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s cause I used after the recommended 30 days. But this detox tea has a side effect my spouse and i experienced. Pain in the chest area, under rib cage extending to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Biggy3rd

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and detoxes as by product
customer_reviews.text: I found a great combo with this tea & Raja's Cup together. I've got through about three 6 six packs of this tea like that and adding some organic Stevia. I have one or two cups every day, enjoyable and nice to know it's good for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lass

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn digestive system
customer_reviews.text: Love this detoxifying tea. I have digestive problems and for my stubborn system, this one works much better than others.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Have bought multiple times and used for years nearly daily. Taste is good. I prefer a slightly non-fruity flavor and so I prefer this flavor of the Yogi detox tea to some of the other flavors. I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: By JR

customer_reviews.title: A real cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this detox tea for a couple of years and it really works. I will drink the tea 3x a day for a week to do a strong cleanse. It will clean out your bowels as needed to get back on a healthy diet. In general, it is a good flavor and aroma to enjoy daily.
customer_reviews.author: J.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Bad Taste and lack Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised to see so many positive reviews, after reading them I got these 6 pkgs. not sure where to start, I doubt this has all herbs mentioned on the box and it taste Cinnamon and that’s all, not ginger black pepper nor licorice nothing. There may be a week hint but not that much. It’s not a good purchase and lesson to never blindly trust positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Became Ill
customer_reviews.text: I got extremely ill drinking this tea. I have boxes that I can never use. Very dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it as a detox and the fact that it is natural. My only complaint is I feel a tightening in my chest, but I just consume it less. It will make you go to the bathroom but nothing you cannot control. Great tea to have handy. Oh yea, it has a spicy taste.
customer_reviews.author: tedz

customer_reviews.title: Great tea for detox
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Tea I think it was a great job at detoxing which I can tell because you urinate more frequently I started taking this because I am on new medications which can be harmful to the kidneys or liver so this will help remove toxins and I noticed my bladder and kidney function is better
customer_reviews.author: lindyrumsey

customer_reviews.title: Overrated !
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing for me. I even used two bags at once... still nothing. I don’t recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan of cinammon-ish flavors but this worked
customer_reviews.text: I usually stay away from cinnamon-ish flavors but this was acceptable. I added some honey and lemon and drank it. Within 8 minutes I was in the bathroom expelling the toxins so I'm guessing this works.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Try this!!! Fully recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn't like most of the Yogi brand teas I've bought him. He loves this one. I will say that the taste is superb. Because I have a sweet tooth, I do put some beet sugar rocks in the tea to sweeten it up a tad. Wonderful flavors. Has done wonders for my body so far. LOVE! A must try if you haven't!
customer_reviews.author: jmelick536

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my neighbor who has some slight diabetes she controls with diet and some high blood pressure. She has been fine over the past couple of doctor visits = what ever she is doing keep doing. Will purchase for her again.
customer_reviews.author: CR Waymire

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea! I drink 1-2 a day. I was nervous about the ginger in the flavoring, but really not too strong. I also mix it with Apple cider vinegar and it hides the strong taste pretty well!

customer_reviews.title: Nooooo detox.
customer_reviews.text: This tea tasted good and was hoping to really detox with this product but no detox what so ever.

customer_reviews.title: I am NOT a spice person but I LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes and smells just like chai tea. I don't usually like spicy foods/teas but the spice in this tea is mild and comforting. I have also noticed in the few weeks that I have been drinking it that it makes me feel fuller so that I am not constantly snacking during the day. I drink two bags a day. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: Theae rea helps me when I feel bloated. I put some honey in it and it taste great

customer_reviews.text: I love all the Yogi brand teas very much. However, this batch of tea bags spill out into my thermos although I don’t see a whole in the bad. As a result, I end of swallow the nasty contents. This is the first time to have this issue but I can no longer enjoy my tea time!!

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money

customer_reviews.title: What a treat
customer_reviews.text: It's probably a placebo effect, but I feel I'm doing my body some good when I unwind with a glass of yogi tea at the end of the day. It's a great substitute for wine if you're trying to cut back! ahaha The flavor is rich, and I've seen other people use the term spicy, but I don't think that's accurate. Think Chai tea latte without the milk. Allspice, Cinnamon.. etc.. It's delicious.

product_meta.title: Yogi Tea - DeTox Tea (6 Pack) - Healthy Cleansing Formula With Traditional Ayurvedic Herbs - 96 Tea Bags
feature_bullets: FLAVOR: Yogi DeTox tea combines "trikatu," a traditional Ayurvedic spice blend of Ginger, Black Pepper and Long Pepper, with warming Ginger, Cinnamon and Cardamom.
ORGANIC: USDA Certified Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified.
CONTENTS: Caffeine free, Gluten free, Vegan and Kosher. No Artificial Flavors or Sweeteners. Individually packaged in compostable tea bags.
BREWING SUGGESTIONS: To get the most out of every cup, bring water to boiling and steep 7 minutes. For a stronger tea, use 2 tea bags.
BENEFITS: Time-honored cleansing herbs, including Dandelion and Burdock, combine with Ayurvedic warming spices to help support healthy cleansing.
